title: Phishing L2 – URL spoofing – SWG Audit
description: Phishing Level 2: URL spoofing simulation. Tests whether the perimeter detects lookalike or spoofing‑style URLs.
keywords: SWG Audit, phishing level 2, URL spoofing, typosquatting, homographs
headline: Phishing – Level 2: URL spoofing
testObjective: Test whether your SWG detects lookalike and spoofing-style URLs using subdomain abuse, typosquatting, and homographs.
attackVector: Attackers register domains that visually resemble legitimate brands to bypass URL reputation filters that only check exact domain matches.

steps.title: Configure your SWG
steps.description: Whitelist swgaudit.com to allow access to this page. Your SWG should inspect URLs for spoofing patterns.

steps.title: Verify your identity
steps.description: Submit your business email to unlock the simulation.

steps.title: Run the test
steps.description: Click the spoofed URL. If your SWG blocks or warns you, it detected the spoofing. If the page loads normally, your SWG failed to detect this lookalike domain.

feedbackFail: This page visible without a warning = perimeter may not detect this path as a spoofing risk.
